name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 极简tab 新标签页（ChatGPT免费）

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 支持全局自由拖拽，大小、颜色、搜索框提示词等修改，是超级自定义化新标签页扩展插件；
short.en: High customizable new tab homepage, with free page layout design and support for ChatGDP

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
修改自定义新标签页

1. 免费的AI聊天工具：帮助您即时获取信息与灵感，提升工作和学习效率。

2. 高级模式：提供生成图片和PPT的能力，助力更好地完成任务。

3. 精美壁纸库：提供大量高清壁纸，让您的浏览器界面充满个性与活力。

4. 多样化组件：多功能小工具和组件，优化您的浏览体验，满足多种需求。
long.en:
Modify and customize the newtab page
1. Free AI chat tool: Help you get instant information and inspiration to improve work and study efficiency.
2. Advanced mode: Provides the ability to generate pictures and PPTs to help you better complete tasks.
3. Exquisite Wallpaper Library: Provides a large number of high-definition wallpapers to make your browser interface full of personality and vitality.
4. Diversified components: Multi-functional widgets and components to optimize your browsing experience and meet multiple needs.
